text: The year 2009 is the 8th year in the history of the Universal Reality Combat Championship, a mixed martial arts promotion based in the Philippines. In 2009 the URCC held 7 events beginning with, URCC Baguio: Rumble in the Highlands. ==Events list== {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="font- size:90%;" |- ! scope="col" | # ! scope="col" | Event Title ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Arena ! scope="col" | Location |- | align=center| 24 | URCC 15: Onslaught | | World Trade Center | Pasay City, Metro Manila, Philippines |- | align=center| 23 | URCC: Rouge Magazine's Black Tie Brawl 2009 | | Ranaissance Hotel Makati | Makati City, Metro Manila, Philippines |- | align=center| 22 | URCC Bacolod Brawl 2009 | | West Negros Gym | Negros Occidental, Philippines |- | align=center| 21 | URCC Davao Digmaan 2009 | | Davao Convention Center | Davao City, Philippines |- | align=center| 20 | URCC Cebu 4: Proving Ground | | | Mandaue City, Cebu, Philippines |- | align=center| 19 | URCC 14: Aggression | | A.Venue Events Hall | Makati City, Metro Manila, Philippines |- | align=center| 18 | URCC Baguio: Rumble in the Highlands | | Baguio Convention Center | Baguio City, Philippines |} ==URCC Baguio: Rumble in the Highlands== URCC Baguio: Rumble in the Highlands was an event held on March 7, 2009 at The Baguio Convention Center in Baguio City, Philippines. ===Results=== ==URCC 14: Aggression== URCC 14: Aggression was an event held on July 18, 2009 at A.Venue Events Hall in Makati City, Metro Manila, Philippines. ===Results=== ==URCC Cebu 4: Proving Ground== URCC Cebu 4: Proving Ground was an event held on June 20, 2009 in Mandaue City, Cebu, Philippines. ===Results=== ==URCC Davao Digmaan 2009== URCC Davao Digmaan 2009 was an event held on August 23, 2009 at The Davao Convention Center in Davao City, Philippines. ===Results=== ==URCC Bacolod Brawl 2009== URCC Bacolod Brawl 2009 was an event held on October 17, 2009 at The West Negros Gym in Negros Occidental, Philippines. ===Results=== ==URCC: Rouge Magazine's Black Tie Brawl 2009== URCC: Rouge Magazine's Black Tie Brawl 2009 was an event held on October 24, 2009 at The Ranaissance Hotel Makati in Makati City, Metro Manila, Philippines. ===Results=== ==URCC 15: Onslaught== URCC 15: Onslaught was an event held on November 21, 2009 at The World Trade Center in Pasay City, Metro Manila, Philippines. ===Results=== ==See also== * Universal Reality Combat Championship ==References== Category:Universal Reality Combat Championship title: 2009 in Universal Reality Combat Championship
